channel.title: Wait Wait...Don't Tell Me!
channel.description: NPR's weekly current events quiz. Have a laugh and test your news knowledge while figuring out what's real and what we've made up.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2014-2019 NPR - For Personal Use Only
channel.itunes:summary: NPR's weekly current events quiz. Have a laugh and test your news knowledge while figuring out what's real and what we've made up.
channel.itunes:author: NPR

item.title: Marin Alsop
